name: Stephanie Chamblee
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior full-stack engineer with 7+ years of experience building secure, scalable applications. Focused on authentication, architecture, and collaboration to drive team success. Known for quickly learning new technologies and reducing engineering toil significantly.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer II
highlights: Built and maintained web applications with Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS, supporting multiple departments to advance the organization's mission.
Promoted after two years from Senior Software Engineer to Senior Software Engineer II in recognition of strong technical leadership and cross-team knowledge sharing.
Led accessibility initiatives: authored internal guidelines, delivered department-wide presentations, and eliminated 95% of accessibility violations.
Authored 12 Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) that standardized development practices and improved decision transparency across the engineering team.
Facilitated postmortems and implemented proactive safeguards, reducing outage frequency and improving system resilience.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Led migration from a custom identity solution to Azure AD B2C, enabling secure authentication for millions of Kroger customers and enhancing reliability.
Re-architected a high-traffic Node.js API by building a middleware that leveraged the service-client architecture, improving test coverage by 80% and reducing onboarding time for new developers.
Conducted technical training sessions to strengthen team expertise in identity protocols.

experience.title: Community Engineer II
highlights: Delivered 300+ custom solutions within one year across varied tech stacks, increasing secure authentication adoption across developer communities.
Published a two-part IoT tutorial series on the Auth0 blog using Arduino and real-time data visualization; received strong community engagement.

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed accessible, mobile-optimized features for cricketwireless.com, including a Node.js microservice that enabled non-technical teams to launch marketing campaigns.
Led sessions on WCAG compliance and development best practices, strengthening accessibility awareness and elevating engineering standards across the department.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
highlights: Built scalable certification tools and OAuth 2.0-compliant eCommerce flows using AWS (SQS, Lambda, and API Gateway).
Delivered full-stack features in Python and JavaScript across high-impact releases, promoting engineering excellence through workshops on accessibility, security, and TDD.

education.degree: Master of Science in Corporate and Public Communication
Bachelor of Science in Professional Communication

projects.title: Review Management Platform
projects.description: Sole developer of a full-stack Node.js and React application that integrated with the HubSpot API to manage customer review content. The platform enabled staff to edit, approve, and publish curated reviews across 10 affiliated company websites. Over the course of 3.5 years, developed new features, handled ongoing maintenance, and delivered a user-friendly interface that streamlined content workflows. Helped improve publishing efficiency and consistency across the organizationâ€™s online presence.

projects.title: Ambassador Program
projects.description: Represented Auth0 as a developer ambassador at conferences and meetups across the U.S., delivering technical talks on authentication, OAuth, and identity best practices to developer audiences.
